posts.post_content:
Hi fellas,

selling a near set of the Awesome T227z.  Included in the lot are 20 of the 24 cards.  Near set includes the harder to find auto driver Ralph Mulford and the two horse cards from the set (Uhlan and Ess H. Kay).  Also includes a nice looking Jack Johnson....

Selling as a lot of 20.  Asking $3,000 for the lot, will ship priority insured mail (included).  Selling to raise funds for another purchase...

PM if you would like to make an offer, or more details or pictures....

Thanks for looking!

Cliff

cards included in the set with grades and back:

2RALPH MULFORDSGC 20 – FAIRHLC
5CHIEF BENDER        SGC 10 – POORME
7RICHARD MARQUARDSGC 1 – FAIRHLC
8ALFRED DE OROSGC 10 - POOR  HLC

23MELVIN SHEPPARD SGC 20 – FAIRME
